tracks.text: 4 missiles launch from the coast of North Korea. A battleship sails. Text, Sea of Japan, Aegis class Warship Kongo
Text, CIC, Combat Information Center
A missile fires from a battleship
A missile fires from the Japanese warship Kongou
On a heat map, a small hot dot collides with a small cold dot and turns into a large hot blob.
An officer covers his mouth.
Text, US Aegis Destroyer Curtis Wilbur
Dead seamen shuffle around the ship.
Text, International Space Station
A dot of light forms under the clouds. It grows by hundreds of miles per second.
The center radiates out, resembling a donut of brilliant light the size of Texas
Text, Tokonosu Airport
The purple haired woman looks at her smoking phone.
She throws her phone away
She takes a cigarette out of her mouth and exhales
She smokes
intro
Text dug into a manicured lawn, Act 12, All DEAD'S attack.
Text, a few minutes ago
She takes Takashi's phone. Cartoon flowers float around her
Text, Calling
Screens cut off. Rika pulls the phone from her ear as it sparks. Smoke rises from it. Brilliant white light shines through the window. She turns to look at the sky.
Blinding light radiates across the sky over the airport. Maintenance workers look up, covering their eyes.
Rika looks through the window, eyes wide.
Rei raises the gun and looks through the scope at Saya. She steps aside.
Near a still power plant, a worker sits in a forklift.
office
Refugee tent
The mini bus careens down the road.
He sees the stopped forklift, holding the last section of a barricade.
A bloody hand lies amidst broken glass on the road. The bus's windshield is shattered. Shido lies face down on the steering wheel.
Dead shuffle past the bus through the broken barricade
Takagi servants lay out lamps along walkways. Soichiro descends stairs.
Dead descend on a man, a few feet inside the walls. More dead approach.
The gates close.
A dead shuffles. Hirano pulls a lever, switches a gauge from SAFE to FIRE
Headshot

She throws a shawl aside and rips a slit in her dress. She puts a strap over her shoulder and stands, with guns on her thigh and hip and another in her hand. She sparkles, framed by cartoon roses. The teens blush. Saya covers Hirano's eyes.
Takashi, Rei, and Saiko imagine Yuriko in an action movie poster
Dead press against the gate. Soichiro turns, eyes narrowed, wearing a hard expression. Bloody limbs reach through the gate bars. Dead faces press and squeeze against the bars.
Takagi walks, then stops. A dense cloud of dead gather at the gate.
The gate bulges
Blood splatters on Matsudo's face.
The gate falls. The horde of dead fall through.
Text, High School of the DEAD
Sparks from fires drift in the twilight. Takashi, Rei, and Saiko stare. Dead shuffle onto the estate.
Dead tear apart Matsudo
Dead knock over lamps
Shizuka covers her face. Hirano and Takagi gape.
Takashi runs. Saiko follows.
Refugees run amid blazing tents.
A songbird in a cage looks around.
Living fall as dead tear them apart.
The refugee swings a machete
She swings a cleaver as dead feed on her.
A worker steps back from the dead, holding a wooden sword.
The dead fly away. Takashi runs up.
Dead fly. Saiko runs through the yard.
She leaps and flips. She cuts down dead.
A dead woman lurches. She kicks the dead, then stabs a dead man behind her through the chest.
Another dead reaches, and she tosses it into a fountain.
A dead lunges. Saiko turns. A barrel presses against the dead's chest.
Rei stands between Saiko and the dead. She pushes, and the dead falls back.
Rei glances at Saiko and smiles. Saiko smiles back.
Hirano looks through a scope.
Headshot
He fires from a terrace. Silhouettes of dead drop from 100 feet away. He releases the magazine, and Arisu runs up with a replacement.
He takes it
A dead flies down the stairs to a terrace. Takashi steps back.
In the dark, raging fires illuminate silhouettes of shuffling dead.
Embers drift in the night.
Soichiro stares out from the terrace. Refugees sit on the terrace. Guards ready guns.
A lieutenant approach Soichiro
Men approach with bats. Takashi and Hirano approach.
Takashi's eyes widen.
His face hardens.
He looks up
Yuriko grabs Saya and slaps her. Saya holds her face and looks up, eyes wide.
Arisu approaches
Yuriko bends down to Arisu's level.
Yuriko hugs Arisu. Saya looks down, eyes glistening.
Yuriko lets go of Arisu and stands.
She steps away and waves her arm.
Saya runs down the terrace. The team follows her.
Soichiro unsheaths a sword.
A guard and a laborer throw dynamite. Dozens of dead explode in a 40 foot mushroom cloud in the garden.
Soichiro walks down the terrace steps. A guard fires a gun, headshotting dead. At the garage, Saya runs up to the humvee. Takashi and Saiko gaurd the door.
He rolls out from under the car.
The team turns to the oncoming dead approaching the garage door.
A dead lurches
Takashi fires. The dead man flies back. Rei and Hirano fan out and ready guns.
They fire. Below the terrace, the Takagi gaurds fire at oncoming dead.
Soichiro slices a dead.
They stand, surrounded by bodies. More approach.
Soichiro decapitates a dead man. Yuriko fires a gun.
Saiko slices a dead as embers float around her. The dead slides towards the garage door, and Shizuka steps back.
A dead shuffles
Arisu rolls a 4 foot tire, knocking the dead over.
Saya runs to the dead, squats over him, closes her eyes, and shoots. Blood splatters over her face.
Shizuka runs
Rei stabs a dead man and kicks him back.
A dead man grabs the gun strapped to her waist and pulls, dragging her back onto boxes. Her skirt rides up, revealing white panties. The gun strap digs into her bulging breasts.
Takashi clubs the dead's hands.
He shoots. Blood splatters the wall.
Matsuda slams the hood and gives Shizuka a thumbs up. She revs the engine.
Hirano runs. Saya gets in the passenger seat. Takashi looks out the hatch.
Matsudo picks up a wrench.
He smiles wide. Saya's eyes shimmer
He bows. Shizuka looks up to see the dead approaching.
She floors it. The humvee takes off. Matsudo spins his wrench.
He swings the wrench.
The humvee flies down a path, running over dead. Soichiro swings his sword and turns.
The car swerves across the flaming garden.
It flies bast him. Saya and Hirano glance through the window at Soichiro, who stares solemnly.
The humvee flies down the suburban street.
The break in the barricade where the bus crashed.

The humvee drives on its right wheels. Saiko leans out the hatch, dangling over the road. Takashi sees the edge of the barricade and grabs Saiko, pulling her into his arms. The car drives through the gap, driving over the edge of the bus. A door flies off, glass shattering.
The car drives down the still, suburban street.
Soichiro and Yuriko stand back to back, surrounded by dead and flames.
The urban landscape scrolls by. The sun peaks over the horizon. Rei looks out the window.
She looks forward. Saya looks down.
The sun looms high in the sky. Tendrils of smoke rise from the sprawling city. Dead shuffle down the elevated highway.
Saya looks back at Takashi, who looks confused then smiles.
Saiko, Takashi, and Kouta Hirano climb on top of the roof.
Kouta holds out the sniper rifle and grins.
Standing with a sword, Saiko glances down and smiles.
He points the barrel and us and shoots. Text, Act 12, All DEAD's Attack
Outro
A woman with a green arm hand walks past the billboard.
The billboard stands under an elevated highway. Trash litters the ground.
The humvee stands dented and smoking.
Saiko, Kouta, Takashi, Rei, Shizuka, and Saya walk down the road.
They carry Arisu and Zero
Takashi stops.
They stare at a building labeled Taiei Shopping Town.
Text, This is the way the world ends. Not with a bang but a whimper. T. S. Eliot, "The Hollow Men"
